keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject

byline.contributor: Nour Youssef contributed reporting from Cairo.

lead_paragraph: The admission after the attack, which killed more than 100 people, was a rare acknowledgment by the coalition that it had hit a civilian site.

headline.print_headline: Saudi-Led Coalition Admits Error in Funeral Bombing in Yemen
headline.main: Saudi-Led Coalition Says It Bombed Yemen Funeral Based on False Information

snippet: The admission after the attack, which killed more than 100 people, was a rare acknowledgment by the coalition that it had hit a civilian site....
